TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TemplatedControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner
Public MustInherit Class TemplatedControlDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner
public ref class TemplatedControlDesigner abstract : System::Web::UI::Design::ControlDesigner

summary.span: 扩展基于模板的服务器控件的设计时行为。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for template-based server controls.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用模板，并派生的控件设计器类类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control designer class that uses templates and derives from the class. 若要运行该示例，编译代码，，然后在设计宿主如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，在设计视图查看该页。To run the example, compile the code, and then in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], view the page in Design view. 选择的控件，单击操作列表来选择要修改的模板，然后使用拖放功能将控件移动到模板。Select the control, click the action list to select a template to modify, and then use the drag-and-drop feature to move controls into the template. > [!NOTE] > 你的项目必须具有对引用`System.Design`程序集。Your project must have a reference to the `System.Design` assembly. [!code-csharp[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/CS/TemplateGroupsSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 要处理组件更改事件的委托。

span.span: Delegate to handle the component changed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改属性后，调用此方法。This method is called after a property has been changed. 它允许实施者可以执行任何可能需要在属性更改后的后续处理。It allows the implementer to perform any post-processing that may be needed after a property change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTemplateModeChanged() cil managed
abstract member OnTemplateModeChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnTemplateModeChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 提供在模板模式被更改时执行附加处理的机会。

span.span: Provides an opportunity to perform additional processing when the template mode is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计图面中的控件上的某些操作的设计器宿主引发事件。The event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control in the design surface. 例如，当用户进入或退出模板编辑模式的控件。For example, an event is raised when the user enters or exits template editing mode for a control. 类提供了一个默认委托来处理事件。The class supplies a default delegate to handle the event. 类派生自重写模板模式更改为关联控件时引发的事件的方法。Classes deriving from the override the method to process events that are raised when the template mode changes for the associated control. 方法允许派生的类进行处理的事件，而无需附加委托。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 默认的委托执行所需的模板模式下更改事件中的更新类，然后调用方法。The default delegate performs the updates that are required for a template mode change event in the base class, and then calls the method. 基中的方法类返回，而不执行任何其他处理事件。The base method in the class returns without performing any additional processing for the event. 如果一个类派生自和重写基方法中，默认委托将调用派生类中重写方法。If a class derives from the and overrides the base method, the default delegate calls the override method in the derived class. 使用属性来确定当前编辑模式的模板中是否为控件设计器。Use the property to determine whether the control designer is in template editing mode currently.

para.span: 由提供的默认委托类执行必要的之前调用基类的所有更新方法。

span.span: The default delegate that is supplied by the class performs all updates necessary for the base class before calling the method.

para.span: 重写方法从派生类中的模板模式下更改事件在设计图面上的控件上执行其他处理。

span.span: Override the method in classes deriving from the to perform additional processing for template mode change events on controls in the design surface.
ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void UpdateDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

summary.span: 更新设计时 HTML。

span.span: Updates the design-time HTML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应调用此方法时将刷新的设计时显示模板框已被更改而不会调用会自动更新设计时 HTML 的方法。You should call this method to refresh the design-time display if the template frames have been changed without calling methods that update the design-time HTML automatically.
